name: URadialSlider
doc:
A simple widget that shows a sliding bar with a handle that allows you to control the value between 0..1.

* No Children

bUseCustomDefaultValue: Whether the slider should draw it's progress bar from a custom value on the slider
MouseUsesStep: Sets new value if mouse position is greater/less than half the step size.
RequiresControllerLock: Sets whether we have to lock input to change the slider value.
OnMouseCaptureBegin: Invoked when the mouse is pressed and a capture begins.
OnMouseCaptureEnd: Invoked when the mouse is released and a capture ends.
OnControllerCaptureBegin: Invoked when the controller capture begins.
OnControllerCaptureEnd: Invoked when the controller capture ends.
OnValueChanged: Called when the value is changed by slider or typing.
SliderRange: A curve that defines how the slider should be sampled. Default is linear.
ValueTags: Adds text tags to the radial slider at the value's position.
SliderHandleStartAngle: The angle at which the Slider Handle will start.
SliderHandleEndAngle: The angle at which the Slider Handle will end.
AngularOffset: Rotates radial slider by arbitrary offset to support full gamut of configurations.
HandStartEndRatio: Start and end of the hand as a ratio to the slider radius (so 0.0 to 1.0 is from the slider center to the handle).
SliderBarColor: The color to draw the slider bar in.
SliderProgressColor: The color to draw the completed progress of the slider bar in.
SliderHandleColor: The color to draw the slider handle in.
CenterBackgroundColor: The color to draw the center background in.
Locked: Whether the handle is interactive or fixed.
StepSize: The amount to adjust the value by, when using a controller or keyboard
UseVerticalDrag: Whether the value is changed when dragging vertically as opposed to along the radial curve.
ShowSliderHandle: Whether to show the slider handle (thumb).
ShowSliderHand: Whether to show the slider hand.

methods.name: GetCustomDefaultValue
methods.doc: Gets the current custom default value of the slider.

methods.name: GetNormalizedSliderHandlePosition
methods.doc: Get the current raw slider alpha from 0 to 1

methods.name: GetValue
methods.doc: Gets the current value of the slider.

methods.name: SetAngularOffset
methods.doc: Sets the Angular Offset for the slider.

methods.name: SetCenterBackgroundColor
methods.doc: Sets the color of the slider bar

methods.name: SetCustomDefaultValue
methods.doc: Sets the current custom default value of the slider.

methods.name: SetHandStartEndRatio
methods.doc: Sets the start and end of the hand as a ratio to the slider radius (so 0.0 to 1.0 is from the slider center to the handle).

methods.name: SetLocked
methods.doc: Sets the handle to be interactive or fixed

methods.name: SetShowSliderHand
methods.doc: Whether to show the slider hand.

methods.name: SetShowSliderHandle
methods.doc: Whether to show the slider handle (thumb).

methods.name: SetSliderBarColor
methods.doc: Sets the color of the slider bar

methods.name: SetSliderHandleColor
methods.doc: Sets the color of the handle bar

methods.name: SetSliderHandleEndAngle
methods.doc: Sets the maximum angle of the slider.

methods.name: SetSliderHandleStartAngle
methods.doc: Sets the minimum angle of the slider.

methods.name: SetSliderProgressColor
methods.doc: Sets the progress color of the slider bar

methods.name: SetSliderRange
methods.doc: Sets the curve for the slider range

methods.name: SetStepSize
methods.doc: Sets the amount to adjust the value by, when using a controller or keyboard

methods.name: SetUseVerticalDrag
methods.doc: Set whether the value is changed when dragging vertically as opposed to along the radial curve.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.doc: Sets the current value of the slider.

methods.name: SetValueTags
methods.doc: Adds value tags to the slider.
